About.title: About Our Factory
About.description: Since 1995, we have been setting the standard for industrial safety footwear manufacturing. Learn more about our production capabilities and commitment to quality.

BrandStory.label: Our Story
BrandStory.title: From Humble Beginnings to Global Manufacturer
BrandStory.p1: It started in 1995 with a simple vision: to make a pair of safety shoes that were actually comfortable and durable for local workers. Our founder, Mr. Li, realized that while safety shoes on the market were tough, they were often heavy and painful to wear. He began his quest in a small workshop in Gaomi with just one vintage sewing machine.
BrandStory.p2: Thirty years later, while our factory has expanded to 6 automated Desma lines and over 300 skilled craftsmen, that original intention has never changed. We aren't just making shoes; we are protecting the feet of workers laboring in extreme environments.
BrandStory.quote: Safety is not a luxury, but a fundamental right for every worker. Our job is to ensure their feet are as comfortable as when they started, even after a long shift.
BrandStory.p3: Today, our safety shoes are exported to over 50 countries worldwide. From the scorching mines of Australia to the icy construction sites of Northern Europe, you can find our products. We combine traditional shoemaking craftsmanship with modern material technology to continuously redefine industrial protection standards.

founded.title: Factory Founded
founded.desc: Established the first semi-automatic production line in Gaomi, serving the domestic construction market.

expansion.title: Going Global
expansion.desc: Obtained export license and shipped the first containers to Southeast Asian markets.

certification.title: Quality Certification
certification.desc: Achieved ISO 9001 certification and obtained EU CE and US ASTM certifications.

global.title: Global Scale
global.desc: Introduced Desma intelligent injection equipment, annual capacity exceeded 1.5 million pairs, serving clients globally.

GlobalFootprint.title: Built for the World
GlobalFootprint.subtitle: Our footprint spans over 50 countries, providing customized solutions for different regional climates and working environments.

europe.title: S3 Eco-Friendly Safety Boot
europe.desc: Flagship series developed for a renowned German construction firm, meeting strict S3 safety standards while using eco-friendly recyclable materials.
europe.challenge: Meeting S3 waterproof ratings and REACH environmental regulations while keeping weight down.
europe.solution: Developed new eco-microfiber leather with German waterproof membrane, passing all tests.

usa.title: Lightweight Logistics Shoe
usa.desc: Designed for warehouse environments like Amazon, focusing on solving foot fatigue from long hours of walking.
usa.challenge: Workers walk over 20k steps daily; traditional steel toes were too heavy and rigid.
usa.solution: Used Nano-carbon toe cap replacing steel, paired with high-rebound EVA midsole, reducing weight by 40%.

middleEast.title: Heat Resistant Oil Field Boot
middleEast.desc: Designed for extreme desert oil field environments, featuring superior heat resistance and sand protection.
middleEast.challenge: Ground temperatures can reach 70째C, with corrosive oil presence.
middleEast.solution: Developed 300째C heat-resistant rubber outsole formula and designed a sand-proof bellow tongue structure.

Certifications.title: Certifications & Standards
Certifications.standardsDesc: Our products are engineered and tested to meet and exceed safety regulations in major global markets, ensuring protection in any environment.

sb.title: Basic Safety (SB)
sb.desc: Equipped with 200J impact-resistant toe cap. Suitable for light industry with no puncture risks.

s1.title: Anti-Static (S1/S1P)
s1.desc: Adds closed heel energy absorption and anti-static properties. S1P adds puncture resistance.

s3.title: Full Protection (S3)
s3.desc: Includes penetration-resistant midsole, water-resistant upper, and cleated outsole. Top choice for construction.

astm.title: USA ASTM F2413
astm.desc: Covers M/I/C (Impact/Compression), EH (Electrical Hazard), and SD (Static Dissipative) ratings.

slide1.title: Protection Without The Weight
slide1.description: Metal-free composite toe protection. 30% lighter than traditional boots, perfect for airport security and electricians.

slide2.title: Standards You Can Trust.
slide2.description: Every pair meets or exceeds international safety standards. Lab-tested for impact, compression, and slip resistance.

slide3.title: Scale With a Trusted Partner.
slide3.description: From 500 pairs to 50,000. Custom designs, rapid sampling, and FOB delivery to 50+ countries.

manufacturing.title: Intelligent Manufacturing
manufacturing.desc: Automated Desma injection machines ensure consistent bonding strength and precise sole density.

quality.title: Lab-Tested Quality
quality.desc: Every batch undergoes rigorous impact, compression, and anti-static testing in our internal lab before shipment.

logistics.title: Global Logistics
logistics.desc: Seamless FOB/CIF shipping to 50+ countries. We handle customs documentation and tracking.

videoBanner.title: See It To Believe It
videoBanner.desc: Transparency is our policy. Take a virtual walkthrough of our ISO 9001 certified production lines and testing labs.

ProductCategories.label: Our Collection
ProductCategories.title: Professional Safety Footwear
ProductCategories.subtitle: Select by industry or browse our complete collection of certified safety shoes.

FAQ.label: Common Questions
FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our manufacturing and ordering process.
FAQ.contactDesc: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

cta.title: Let's Build Your Safety Footwear Brand Together
cta.desc: Our engineers are ready to review your specs. Get a free consultation and quote within 24 hours.

moq.a: Our standard MOQ is 500 pairs per style. For first-time orders, we can discuss smaller trial quantities.

leadTime.q: What is the production lead time?
leadTime.a: Standard lead time is 35-45 days after deposit and sample confirmation.

customization.q: Can you put my logo on the shoes?
customization.a: Yes, we offer full OEM/ODM services including logo on tongue, side, insole, and custom box design.

certifications.q: What safety certifications do you have?
certifications.a: Our products are certified by CE (EN ISO 20345), ASTM F2413-18, and CSA Z195. We can provide test reports from Intertek or SGS upon request.

samples.a: We provide samples for quality checking. Sample fee is required but will be 100% refunded when you place the bulk order.

payment.q: What payment terms do you accept?
payment.a: We accept T/T (30% deposit, 70% before shipment) and L/C at sight for large orders. For small sample payments, PayPal is available.

shipping.a: Yes, we can arrange FOB, CIF, or DDP shipping terms. We work with reliable freight forwarders to deliver goods to your designated port or warehouse.

visit.a: Absolutely. We welcome clients to visit our facility in Gaomi, China. We can arrange airport pickup from Qingdao Liuting International Airport.

Footer.about: Professional safety footwear manufacturer since 1990. We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern technology to protect workers worldwide.
Footer.address:
No. 128, Industrial Park Road,
Gaomi City, Shandong, China

ProductsPage.title: Product Catalog
ProductsPage.description: Browse our complete collection of certified industrial safety footwear. Use the filters to find the perfect match for your workplace requirements.

ProductGrid.noProductsDesc: Please check back later or contact us for catalog.

hero.title: Your Brand.
hero.description: Scale your footwear business with a trusted manufacturing partner. We turn your concepts into certified, market-ready products with speed and precision.

hotspots.upperMaterialDesc: Full grain leather, suede, or breathable microfiber mesh.
hotspots.outsoleTechDesc: Dual-density PU/PU or Rubber. Oil & Slip resistant (SRC).

cooperation.title: Flexible Cooperation Models
cooperation.subtitle: Choose the level of customization that fits your business stage.

CustomizationOptions.title: Total Customization Freedom
CustomizationOptions.description: Don't settle for generic off-the-shelf products. We give you full control over every detail of your safety footwear, ensuring it meets your specific market demands and price points.

logoBranding.title: Logo & Branding
logoBranding.desc: Your brand, front and center. We offer various logo applications.

materialsColors.title: Materials & Colors
materialsColors.desc: Choose from our premium library of leathers and textiles.

soleTech.title: Sole Technology
soleTech.desc: Select the right outsole for your market's terrain.

packaging.title: Packaging
packaging.desc: Retail-ready presentation that stands out on the shelf.

InteractiveOemCase.title: Inside the Process:
InteractiveOemCase.summary: A 6-month journey from a rough sketch to 50,000 pairs delivered. Solving the challenge of extreme heat resistance and metatarsal protection.

design.label: Consultation
design.title: Translating Requirements into Blueprints
design.desc: The client needed a boot that could withstand 300째C surfaces and 200J impacts. Our R&D team spent 3 days analyzing the mining terrain in Pilbara. We proposed a hybrid Kevlar-Leather upper design that reduced weight by 15% without compromising safety.
design.quote: The 3D rendering was spot on. They understood our safety needs better than we did.

mold.label: Design & CAD
mold.title: Precision Tooling for Custom Outsoles
mold.desc: To ensure maximum grip on loose gravel, we opened a new dual-density PU/Rubber mold. The tread pattern was engineered with self-cleaning channels. The mold opening took just 12 days, 30% faster than industry average.
mold.quote: Fastest mold opening we've seen in 10 years of sourcing.

sample.label: Prototyping
sample.title: From Digital to Physical
sample.desc: First samples were produced within 7 days. We identified a potential pressure point on the ankle and adjusted the collar padding density immediately. The second version (V2) was approved instantly for lab testing.
sample.quote: V2 sample fit perfectly. The comfort level was beyond expectation.

test.label: Mass Production
test.title: Rigorous ISO 20345 Validation
test.desc: Every batch underwent 15 critical tests in our in-house lab: Impact resistance, Antistatic discharge, and Flexing durability (50,000 cycles). We also sent samples to Intertek for third-party certification.
test.quote: Having an in-house lab saved us weeks of waiting for 3rd party reports.

delivery.label: Global Delivery
delivery.title: On-Time Delivery, Every Time
delivery.desc: Production lines ran at full capacity. We implemented a 5-checkpoint QC system. The final container was loaded with custom retail packaging, barcoded for their warehouse system, and shipped FOB Qingdao.
delivery.quote: Goods arrived in perfect condition. Packaging was retail-ready as promised.
